sentences.cn: 我们要敢于拒绝。

sentences.c: I didn't dare to ask.
sentences.cn: 我不敢问。

sentences.c: He won't dare to break his promise.
sentences.cn: 他不敢食言。

trans.cn: 致力于; 使聚焦于; 对（某事或做某事）予以注意; 把…作为兴趣中心
专注于：给予大量关注某个特定的人、主题或事物。

sentences.c: He prefers to focus on the positive.
sentences.cn: 他更愿意关注积极面。

sentences.c: His eyes slowly began to focus on what looked like a small dark ball.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛开始慢慢聚焦到那个小黑球似的东西上。

sentences.c: What I'm going to do in this lecture is focus on something very specific.
sentences.cn: 我在这次讲座中将集中讲解非常具体的问题。

trans.cn: 取出；带出(散步等)；除去(污点等)；取得(专卖权等)
扣除，排除：指从总数中减去一部分，或者从范围中排除某些内容。
取出，提取：指从某处获取或提取出某物。
发泄，宣泄：指通过某种方式释放情绪或压力。
消除，清除：指除去某物，使其不再存在。
击败，淘汰：指在比赛或竞争中战胜对手，使其被淘汰。
借出，租出：指将某物借给他人使用，或者将房屋等出租给他人。
订购，购买：指通过订购或购买获取某物。
开始，着手：指开始进行某项活动或任务。

sentences.c: Would you take out the trash?
sentences.cn: 你可以把垃圾带出去吗？

sentences.c: Should I take out a loan?
sentences.cn: 我该去贷款吗？

sentences.c: How many teeth did the dentist take out?
sentences.cn: 牙科医生拔了几颗牙？

trans.cn: 既然
既然，由于
现在，此刻
考虑到，鉴于

sentences.c: How do you fill your day now that you've retired?
sentences.cn: 现在你已退休了，怎样打发你的日子？

sentences.c: I only wish he were here now that things are getting better for me.
sentences.cn: 既然我的情况正在好转，我真希望他在这儿。

sentences.c: They are hoping for a return to normality now that the war is over.
sentences.cn: 既然战争结束了，他们希望一切都恢复常态。

trans.cn: 以致于；结果
以便，为了：用于引导目的状语从句，表示一个行动或结果的目的或目标。

sentences.c: Bend the wire so that it forms a 'V'.
sentences.cn: 把铁丝弯成V形。

sentences.c: Can you work it so that we get free tickets?
sentences.cn: 你能不能为我们搞到些免费票？

sentences.c: Bess spoke up, smiling so that her dimples showed.
sentences.cn: 贝丝大声发言，微笑着，使脸上露出了两个酒窝。

trans.cn: 沉思；陷入沉思；深思的
认真思考：非常用心地思考。

sentences.c: Amaya was deep in thought when her mom said it was time to go shopping.
sentences.cn: 当妈妈说该去购物时，阿玛亚陷入了沉思。

sentences.c: Alice had been so deep in thought that she had walked past her car without even seeing it.
sentences.cn: 爱丽斯陷入深深的思考之中，连经过自己的车都没看到。

sentences.c: They now walked on in silence; each of them deep in thought.
sentences.cn: 他们俩默不作声地往前走，各人在想各人的心思。

trans.cn: 成功于
成功；在……方面成功；顺利完成

sentences.c: Hard work is the name of the game if you want to succeed in business.
sentences.cn: 要想生意兴旺，勤奋工作是关键。

sentences.c: I had always impressed upon the children that if they worked hard they would succeed in life.
sentences.cn: 我过去总是让孩子们明白，生活中如果他们努力就会成功。

sentences.c: What made Du succeed in building her ROV?
sentences.cn: 是什么让杜成功建造了她的 ROV？

synos.cn: 成功；在…方面成功；顺利完成

trans.cn: 相对论
相对论：物理学中的两个理论，即狭义相对论和广义相对论。这两个理论主要由阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦在20世纪初发展而来，从中得出了一些重要的结果，如物质和能量的等价性和爱因斯坦场方程式。

sentences.c: According to the theory of relativity, nothing can travel faster than light.
sentences.cn: 根据相对论，任何东西都无法超越光速。

sentences.c: Einstein's theory of relativity won for him universal esteem.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦的相对论赢得了全世界对他的崇敬。

sentences.c: My colleague mentioned how the theory of relativity completely changed the field of physics.
sentences.cn: 我的同事提到了相对论如何彻底改变了物理学领域。

trans.cn: 继续
继续：持续进行某个动作或状态。
进行：继续或进行某个活动或事件。
发生：事件或情况正在进行或发生。
夸夸其谈：滔滔不绝地说话，尤指夸大其词。
继续前进：继续或像进行旅程一样继续前进。

sentences.c: Tickets go on sale this week.
sentences.cn: 票本周开始出售。

sentences.c: The shoes go on the shoe shelf.
sentences.cn: 鞋子应该放在鞋架上。

sentences.c: It won't go on beyond midnight.
sentences.cn: 这事不会延续到午夜以后。

synos.cn: 继续；过去；继续下去；发生

trans.cn: 在…领域；在……方面；在领域的

sentences.c: The department is blazing a trail in the field of laser surgery.
sentences.cn: 这个部门正在为激光外科学领域开辟一条新路。

sentences.c: In the field of consumer electronics, Philips is determined to remain a world leader.
sentences.cn: 飞利浦决心在电子消费品行业保持世界领先地位。

sentences.c: In the field of classical music, he still reigns supreme.
sentences.cn: 在古典音乐领域，他仍然是最为杰出的。

trans.cn: 诺贝尔奖
诺贝尔奖

sentences.c: I certainly don't begrudge him the Nobel Prize.
sentences.cn: 我肯定不会妒忌他得了获诺贝尔奖。

sentences.c: The Nobel Prize has become the ultimate accolade in the sciences.
sentences.cn: 诺贝尔奖已成为科学界的最高荣誉。

sentences.c: The award of the Nobel Prize has crowned a glorious career in physics.
sentences.cn: 荣获诺贝尔奖使其物理学研究的辉煌事业达到了顶点。

trans.cn: 去世；停止；度过时间
去世：指生命的终结，死亡。
消失：指逐渐离开或消失。

sentences.c: 'Pass away' is a euphemism for 'die'.
sentences.cn: “去世”是“死”的委婉语。

sentences.c: Where did Yang Jiang pass away?
sentences.cn: 杨绛在哪里去世的？

sentences.c: Which year did he pass away?
sentences.cn: 他是哪一年去世的？

trans.cn: 核武器
核武器：从裂变或聚变核反应中获得能量的武器。

sentences.c: Enriched uranium is a key component of a nuclear weapon.
sentences.cn: 浓缩铀是核武器的一个关键组成部分。

sentences.c: If somebody knows you have a nuclear weapon in your house, they're going to think twice about breaking in.
sentences.cn: 如果知道你家里有核武器，他们在破门而入之前肯定会再三考虑。

sentences.c: They know that they will be treated differently if they can prove they have a nuclear weapon.
sentences.cn: 他们知道如果能证明自己拥有核威慑力，整个世界就会用另一种态度来对待他们。

trans.cn: 无

sentences.c: Yuan Longping is the Father of Hybrid Rice.
sentences.cn: 袁隆平是杂交水稻之父。

sentences.c: He is regarded as the "Father of Hybrid Rice".
sentences.cn: 他被誉为“杂交水稻之父”。

sentences.c: Yuan Longping, the Father of Hybrid Rice, was born in 1930.
sentences.cn: “杂交水稻之父”袁隆平生于1930年。

trans.cn: 从那以后
在那之后的时间内

sentences.c: That was years ago. I've changed jobs since then.
sentences.cn: 那是多年以前的事了。自那以来我已经换过几个工作了。

sentences.c: Since then, Michael has lived an unexceptional life.
sentences.cn: 从那时开始，麦克尔就过着普通的生活。

sentences.c: She had a sort of breakdown some years ago, and since then she has been very shy.
sentences.cn: 她几年前曾遭遇精神崩溃，从那以后她一直怯生生的。

trans.cn: 和…一起[合起来]

sentences.c: We tied his hands together with rope.
sentences.cn: 我们用绳子把他的手绑在一起。

sentences.c: The butter and flour are rubbed together with the fingertips.
sentences.cn: 黄油和面粉被指尖给搓在一起。

sentences.c: The papers were in a pile, tied together with a tape.
sentences.cn: 报纸叠成一摞，用带子捆了起来。

trans.cn: 无
取得很大进步：在某个领域或任务上取得很大的进展或进步。

sentences.c: As far as I'm concerned, students who make a lot of progress should also be rewarded with prizes.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，取得很大进步的学生也应该得到奖励作为回报。

sentences.c: First you make a lot of progress and you fell happy.
sentences.cn: 首先你取得了很大的进步，你会感到快乐。

sentences.c: You will make a lot of progress if you work hard enough.
sentences.cn: 如果你够努力的话，你就会取得很大的进步。

trans.cn: 结核杆菌, 结核病, 肺结核
无
继续使用：指某物继续被使用或保持有效状态。

sentences.c: All three systems remain in use today.
sentences.cn: 这三个系统一直沿用到现在。

sentences.c: Workers are building the new locks alongside the old ones, which will remain in use.
sentences.cn: 工人们正在旧船闸的一侧修建新的船闸，这些旧船闸将继续使用。

sentences.c: While many facilities remain in use after the Games or are converted for new purposes, quite a few sit virtually as empty as the original in Olympia, Greece.
sentences.cn: 虽然很多设施在奥运会后仍在使用或改作新用途，但也有不少设施实际上和希腊奥林匹亚最初的竞技场一样是空闲着的。

trans.cn: 以…着称

sentences.c: Well-known figures would be a big plus for the new board.
sentences.cn: 名人会成为新董事会的一大优势。

sentences.c: These licenses can be used over the Internet as well (like an online banking application) because the end user is well known since they must be specifically identifiable for this license.
sentences.cn: 也可以通过因特网使用这些许可（比如在线银行应用程序），因为最终用户是已知的，因而必须被许可明确识别。

sentences.c: That turned out to be very beneficial, since managing an online shop for a well-known brand developed their professional spirit.
sentences.cn: 结果证明这是很用的，因为为知名品牌管理网店能够开发他们的专业精神。

trans.cn: 抗日战争

sentences.c: He stopped performing for eight years across the Anti-Japanese war.
sentences.cn: 整个抗战期间，他罢演了八年。

sentences.c: Victory is not only rely on to play a game of war will win, you need may be hard for a long time of Anti-Japanese war.
sentences.cn: 胜利不是只靠打一场仗就能赢得的，你需要的也许是艰苦的长期抗战。

sentences.c: The problem of refugee during the anti-Japanese war is an important topic in the research of Chinese modern social history.
sentences.cn: 抗战时期的难民问题，是中国近现代社会史研究的重要课题。

trans.cn: 做出决定；做决定；作出决定
做决定：在面临选择时，经过思考后确定一个方案或选择。

sentences.c: We can't make a decision based on hearsay and guesswork.
sentences.cn: 我们不能根据传言和猜测作决定。

sentences.c: Check out the lie of the land before you make a decision.
sentences.cn: 要摸清情况后再作决定。

sentences.c: I've asked to see all the facts and figures before I make a decision.
sentences.cn: 我已要求在看到所有的确切信息后再作决定。

trans.cn: 急救
急救：指在事故或突然生病后尽快给予的基本医疗处理。

sentences.c: All members of the team have trained in first aid.
sentences.cn: 全队队员都接受过急救培训。

sentences.c: There are many emergencies which need prompt first aid treatment.
sentences.cn: 有很多紧急情况需要迅速的急救治疗。

sentences.c: Make sure you keep a well-stocked first aid kit ready to deal with any emergency.
sentences.cn: 确保你有一套足够库存的急救用具，随时应对任何突发情况。

trans.cn: 天天；一天又一天
日复一日：表示连续不断地、似乎无尽的日子。

sentences.c: She hates doing the same work day after day.
sentences.cn: 她讨厌日复一日做同样的工作。

sentences.c: The newspaper job had me doing the same thing day after day.
sentences.cn: 这份报业的工作让我日复一日地做同一件事情。

sentences.c: Day after day, he became very bored.
sentences.cn: 日复一日，他变得非常无聊。

trans.cn: 创建，建立
建立：将某物建立起来或使其开始运作。
设立：在某地或某个场所建立或设立某物。
安装：将设备或机器安装好并使其准备好进行操作。
筹备：为某项活动或计划做准备工作。

sentences.c: The occupying forces set up a puppet government.
sentences.cn: 占领军建立了一个傀儡政府。

sentences.c: I've set up a meeting for Friday.
sentences.cn: 我已安排好在星期五开会。

sentences.c: He set up a trust for his children.
sentences.cn: 他为子女安排好了信托财产。

phrases.cn: 准备时间；建立时间；设置时间

trans.cn: 纵横字谜
填字游戏：一种谜题，其中答案是根据提示写入编号方格的单词，这些方格横向和纵向排列。

sentences.c: Her mother sighed and rubbed out another mistake in the crossword puzzle.
sentences.cn: 她母亲叹了口气，擦掉了拼字游戏中的另一个填错的地方。

sentences.c: It's only a crossword puzzle that helps increase my vocabulary.
sentences.cn: 这只是一个有助于增加我的词汇量的填字游戏。

sentences.c: Or a book or crossword puzzle. Or a nap.
sentences.cn: 像熨衣服，或者是读一本书，玩纵横填字游戏，或者小睡一会都可以。

trans.cn: 基准样式

sentences.c: The story is based on fact.
sentences.cn: 这个故事是根据真人真事写的。

sentences.c: The book is based on personal experience.
sentences.cn: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

sentences.c: The novel is based on a true story.
sentences.cn: 这部小说是根据真实的故事写成的。

trans.cn: 同“jump”
跳起来：指以快速的动作从地面或座位上跃起。

sentences.c: I tried to jump up, but I could not stir a limb, then I yelled aloud in a frenzy of fright.
sentences.cn: 我试图跳起来，可是我四肢动弹不得，然后我在惊骇中大声喊叫起来。

sentences.c: Now jump up, there's a good fellow, and don't lie moping there on a fine morning like this!
sentences.cn: 快跳起来吧，好小伙儿，这么好的早晨，别愁眉苦脸地躺在那儿！

sentences.c: He wanted to jump up and run outside, screaming like a madman.
sentences.cn: 他想在外面跑跳，像疯子似的尖叫。

trans.cn: 及时
及时地；准时地：在某个特定的时间之前或之内。
最终；终究：在某个未来的时间点。
逐渐地；慢慢地：随着时间的推移。

sentences.c: I hope we get there in time.
sentences.cn: 我希望我们及时到达那里。

sentences.c: It's impossible to get there in time.
sentences.cn: 不可能及时到达那里。

sentences.c: Do you know your check-in time?
sentences.cn: 你知道办理登机手续的时间吗？

trans.cn: 追赶，跟踪
追逐或追赶某人或某物，通常是为了抓住或追求他们
追求或试图获得某人的爱、关注或喜欢
追求或试图获得某物，特别是在商业或经济方面

sentences.c: They were obliged to run after him continually, now left, now right, wherever his legs took him.
sentences.cn: 她们不得不不停地跟着他跑，一会儿左，一会儿右，紧紧跟着他。

sentences.c: Lots of kids like to run after Ted's pet.
sentences.cn: 很多孩子喜欢追着泰德的宠物跑。

sentences.c: The hunter waved to the dog to run after it.
sentences.cn: 猎人向狗挥手，让狗去追它。

trans.cn: 视觉（或精神）上影响强烈的; 令人眼花缭乱; 引人注目的; 醒目的
跳出：指以快速的动作从某处跳跃出来。
极易引起注意：指因为与其他同类事物不同而容易被注意到。

sentences.c: You may not be able to jump out of the car's way soon enough without the stress.
sentences.cn: 你可能无法在没有压力的情况下迅速跳出行车道。

sentences.c: At that point, the frog decides to jump out.
sentences.cn: 就在这时，青蛙决定跳出来。

sentences.c: But in fact, what kills the frog is its own inability to decide when it has to jump out.
sentences.cn: 但事实上，杀死青蛙的原因是它自己不能决定什么时候跳出来。

trans.cn: 突然；猛地
突然地，出乎意料地

sentences.c: All of a sudden she didn't look sleepy any more.
sentences.cn: 突然她看上去不再困倦了。

sentences.c: All of a sudden, right after the summer, Mother gets married.
sentences.cn: 突然之间，夏天刚过完母亲就结婚了。

sentences.c: "So why did he get interested all of a sudden?"— "Search me."
sentences.cn: “那么他为什么突然感兴趣了呢？”—“我哪知道。”

trans.cn: 下降，沉没, 屈服, 被记下
下降：指向地面或水中移动；沉没。
被吞咽：指能够被吞咽。
被接受：指被接受或认同。
被记住：指在后世被记住。
离开大学：指离开大学。
遭受失败：指遭受失败或失利。
发生：指发生。
日落：指太阳下落。

sentences.c: At midday everyone would go down to Reg's Café.
sentences.cn: 中午每个人都去雷吉的小餐馆。

sentences.c: Go down the road till you reach the traffic lights.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条路一直走到红绿灯处。

sentences.c: "You go down that passageway over there."—"Which one?"
sentences.cn: “你顺着那边的过道走。”—“哪个过道？”

synos.cn: 下降；平静下来；传下去；被接受

trans.cn: 所以,因而

sentences.c: Swaddle your newborn baby so that she feels secure.
sentences.cn: 用布裹紧你刚出生的孩子，这样她就会感到安全。

sentences.c: Bess spoke up, smiling so that her dimples showed.
sentences.cn: 贝丝大声发言，微笑着，使脸上露出了两个酒窝。

sentences.c: They brought her meat so that she never went hungry.
sentences.cn: 他们给她带来了肉，这样她就再也不用挨饿了。

trans.cn: 躺下
躺下：指身体平放在床上或其他平面上。这是一个不及物动词短语，用于描述人或动物躺下休息或睡觉。
屈服或接受失败、失望或侮辱：这个短语常用于描述某人在面对失败、失望或侮辱时，以温顺或卑微的态度屈服或接受。也可以用于表示某人故意不履行职责或忽视自己的工作。

sentences.c: Hadn't you better lie down now?
sentences.cn: 现在你躺下来不是更好一些吗？

sentences.c: You can finally lie down.
sentences.cn: 你终于能躺下了。

sentences.c: Stand up. Lie down.
sentences.cn: 站起来，躺下去。

trans.cn: 突然大受欢迎，迅速流行
脱下：指将衣物或鞋子从身上或脚上取下。
起飞：指飞机离开地面开始飞行。
脱离：指从某个地方或状态中解脱出来。
扣除：指以折扣的方式减去一部分。
模仿：指模仿某人或某物的行为或风格。

sentences.c: You can watch aircraft take off or land at close quarters.
sentences.cn: 你可以近距离地观看飞机起飞或降落。

sentences.c: How many days did you take off ?
sentences.cn: 你休了几天假？

sentences.c: The hairdresser asked me how much she should take off.
sentences.cn: 理发师问我头发剪多少。

trans.cn: 无

sentences.c: The towers will stick out of the water and be lit, to warn shipping, and also be designed to be lifted out of the water for maintenance and to clean seaweed from the blades.
sentences.cn: 这些塔会升出水面并且亮灯，用以警示船只避让，同时也能够完全升到水面以上，以方便维修螺旋桨和清理叶片上的水草。

sentences.c: Pull a knife, piece of metal, or stick out of a deep wound.
sentences.cn: 不要将刀子、金属物碎片或者棍棒拔出伤口。

sentences.c: Like nowhere else in the Antarctica, amazing rock formations stick out of the Antarctic ice shield in Queen Maud Land.
sentences.cn: 像在其他地方在南极洲，令人惊讶的岩层伸出的南极冰盾慕德土地。

trans.cn: 谢天谢地!感谢上帝!
感谢上帝：用于表达感激或宽慰之情，是 thank God 的一种形式，但没有提及上帝。

sentences.c: Thank goodness that's over!
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，事情总算过去了！

sentences.c: Well, thank goodness that's over!
sentences.cn: 好啦，谢天谢地，这件事总算过去了！

sentences.c: Thank goodness it's cool in here.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，这里很凉爽。

trans.cn: 熄灭,用,发表,促销生产,激怒@
出发,努力
扑灭（火焰）：将火焰扑灭或熄灭。
发布（新闻、声明等）：公开宣布或发布。
使困扰、烦恼或不安：给某人带来困扰、烦恼或不安。
提供（食物、饮料等）：提供食物、饮料等供他人享用。
生产（产品）：制造或生产产品。
推迟或取消（比赛、活动等）：推迟或取消原计划的比赛、活动等。

sentences.c: He put out his hand to Alfred.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸向艾尔弗雷德。

sentences.c: We put out from Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 我们从利物浦起航。

sentences.c: He looked really put out.
sentences.cn: 看来他真生气了。

synos.cn: 熄灭；伸出；出版；使不方便，打扰

trans.cn: 小苏打；碳酸氢钠
苏打粉：一种用于烘焙的化学物质，常用于面包、蛋糕等食品的发酵过程中。

sentences.c: Baking powder and baking soda make the cake rise.
sentences.cn: 发酵粉和小苏打可以使蛋糕发酵。

sentences.c: They are flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, baking powder and spices.
sentences.cn: 配料有面粉、糖、盐、小苏打、发酵粉和香料。

sentences.c: They turn to household staples like lemons, baking soda or yogurt when it's time to clear skin of acne, soften rough patches or keep teeth sparkling.
sentences.cn: 他们会在清理粉刺、软化粗糙的皮肤或让牙齿闪闪发光的时候，选择柠檬、小苏打或酸奶等日常用品。

synos.cn: 小苏打；[无化]碳酸氢钠；发酵粉

trans.cn: 保持冷静；保持镇静；保持镇定
保持冷静：在紧张或危急的情况下保持冷静和镇定。

sentences.c: The main thing is to stay calm.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是要保持冷静。

sentences.c: I know that when animals are frightened or excited, you have to stay calm.
sentences.cn: 我知道，在动物受惊时或是兴奋时，你得保持冷静。

sentences.c: In case of fire, we should stay calm and leave as quickly as possible.
sentences.cn: 万一发生火灾，我们应该保持冷静，尽快离开。

trans.cn: 保护；保护……免受；不受…之害
保护……不受……

sentences.c: The layers of cloth not only protect from the harsh sun and wind but also conceal their emotions.
sentences.cn: 这些层叠的布不仅能保护他们免受强烈的阳光和风的侵袭，也掩盖了他们的情绪。

sentences.c: Cover the burn with clean, non-fluffy material to protect from infection.
sentences.cn: 用干净的没有绒毛的材料包扎伤口来防止感染。

sentences.c: Defamation and public security restrictions on the press should remain in place to protect from false or legitimately dangerous information.
sentences.cn: 对新闻界的诽谤和公开安全限制，应适可而止，以防止虚假或合法的危险信息。

trans.cn: 无

sentences.c: Some scientists hypothesize that the monkeys rub their bodies with the millipedes because doing so helps protect them from mosquitoes.
sentences.cn: 一些科学家猜测，这些猴子用千足虫擦自己的身体，是因为这样做有助于保护它们免受蚊子叮咬。

sentences.c: She spent months of studying what the rest of the world was doing to protect consumers from tainted honey and questioning beekeepers and industry on what was needed here.
sentences.cn: 她花了几个月研究世界上其它国家如何保护消费者免受假蜂蜜的毒害，咨询养蜂人和行业这究竟需要什么措施。

sentences.c: This grim outlook, the subject of a recent series in the Times-Picayune, has reignited debate about how to protect the area from the sea, and how much to spend doing it.
sentences.cn: 由于未来形式严峻，今日在Times-Picayune上发起了相关的讨论，如怎样保护该地区免于受海水的淹没，又应该花费多少去实施保护措施。

trans.cn: 靠向路边
靠边停车：将车辆停靠在路边或边缘，通常是为了让其他车辆通过或者停下来处理一些事情。

sentences.c: He noticed a man behind him in a blue Ford gesticulating to pull over.
sentences.cn: 他注意到后面一辆蓝色福特车里的一个男人示意他靠边停车。

sentences.c: Later, many cars began to pull over because the storm was getting worse and worse.
sentences.cn: 之后，许多汽车开始靠边停车，因为风暴变得越来越严重。

sentences.c: Please pull over and stop over there.
sentences.cn: 请靠边停车，在那儿停下。

synos.cn: 把…开到路边；开到路边；靠岸

trans.cn: 记住
留意某事物：仔细观察、留意某事物。

sentences.c: Police have asked residents to keep an eye out for anything suspicious.
sentences.cn: 警方要求居民密切注意一切可疑的情况。

sentences.c: If neighbors are strangers to one another, they are less likely to sweep the sidewalk of an elderly couple living next door or keep an eye out for young trouble makers.
sentences.cn: 如果邻居彼此都是陌生人，他们就不太可能打扫住在隔壁的老年夫妇门前的人行道，也不太可能留意到一些捣乱的年轻人。

sentences.c: If you've explored the area before, keep an eye out for familiar sights—you may be surprised how quickly identifying a distinctive rock or tree can restore your bearings.
sentences.cn: 如果你以前曾探索过这一区域，请密切留意熟悉的景物——你可能会惊讶于，认出一块独特的岩石或一棵奇特的树竟能如此迅速地让人重获方向。

synos.cn: 留心或注意到某人或某事物；当心， 警惕

trans.cn: 使(飞机)着陆
使倒下：使物体倒塌或崩溃。
使下降：使物体从较高的位置下降。
降低：减少（如价格或水平）。

sentences.c: We aim to bring down prices on all our computers.
sentences.cn: 我们打算降低我们所有计算机的价格。

sentences.c: The scandal may bring down the government.
sentences.cn: 那件丑闻可能使政府垮台。

sentences.c: If you're running upstairs, go to my room and bring down my sweater, please.
sentences.cn: 如果你要上楼的话，请到我的房间把我的毛衣拿下来。

trans.cn: 和…比起来

sentences.c: It's much easier compared with last time.
sentences.cn: 这与上次相比容易得多。

sentences.c: My own problems seem insignificant compared with other people's.
sentences.cn: 与别人的问题相比，我自己的问题算不得什么。

sentences.c: Profits have risen by 15 per cent compared with the corresponding period last year.
sentences.cn: 与去年同期相比利润增长了15%。

trans.cn: 无
固定数量的：指一个确定的数量或数量范围。

sentences.c: Readers will be required to pay when they have exceeded a set number of its online articles per month.
sentences.cn: 当读者每月在线（阅读）文章超过规定数量时，他们将被要求付费。

sentences.c: You can do this by learning a set number of lines of poetry at different times of the day and seeing when most lines stick.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过这种方式弄清自己的生物节奏，即在一天内的不同时间学习一定行数的诗句，然后看看什么时候记住的诗句最多。

sentences.c: The thing is, each major movie company pretty much had only one orchestra for all their productions, a set number of regular musicians.
sentences.cn: 事实是，每个大型电影公司都只有一个乐团来演奏他们的所有作品，也有一些是常规演奏的音乐家。

trans.cn: 谋生, 挣钱度日, 维持生活
谋生：通过某种方式赚取生活费用或维持生计。

sentences.c: Everyone has his dream of living a happy life, but it is courage that he needs to make one's dream come true.
sentences.cn: 人人都梦想过美好的生活，但是梦想的实现是需要勇气的。

trans.cn: 探察(某人秘密)

sentences.c: I'm going to dive into the sea.
sentences.cn: 我要潜入海里了。

sentences.c: I'm afraid to dive into the water.
sentences.cn: 我害怕潜入水中。

sentences.c: Turning around, the fisher folk saw Pinocchio dive into the sea and heard him cry out, "I'll save him!"
sentences.cn: 渔夫们转过身来，看见皮诺乔跳进海里，听到他大叫：“我要救他！”

word: honesty truly is the best policy

trans.cn: 无
从前；很久很久以前；古时候
从前，很久以前：在过去的某个时候。

sentences.c: Once upon a time there was a princess...
sentences.cn: 从前有一位公主…

sentences.c: Once upon a time there was a beautiful princess.
sentences.cn: 从前，有一位美丽的公主。

sentences.c: Traditional stories make use of formulaic expressions like 'Once upon a time...'.
sentences.cn: 传统故事采用“从前…”一类的套语。

trans.cn: 逃走；逃跑
逃跑，离家出走，或者是逃脱

sentences.c: His first instinct was to run away.
sentences.cn: 他的本能反应就是逃跑。

sentences.c: I can't stand any more. I'm going to run away.
sentences.cn: 我再也忍受不了了，我打算逃跑。

sentences.c: They never became tame; they would run away if you approached them.
sentences.cn: 它们从没有被驯服，如果你靠近，它们就跑开了。

trans.cn: 不再
不再，不再是，不再存在

sentences.c: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.cn: 这些条件不再适用。

sentences.c: He no longer lives here.
sentences.cn: 他不再住这儿了。

sentences.c: He's no longer a depressive character.
sentences.cn: 他不再是一个抑郁的人物。

trans.cn: 经过@
走过
错过：没有被注意到或被某人采取行动的情况下发生。

sentences.c: As they pass by, a piteous wailing is heard.
sentences.cn: 他们经过时，传出一阵痛哭声。

sentences.c: Birds were chattering somewhere, and occasionally he could hear a vehicle pass by.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿们在某处啁啾，偶尔他能听到一辆汽车经过。

sentences.c: Also, you can watch different people pass by.
sentences.cn: 此外，你可以看到不同的人经过。

trans.cn: - 〈非正〉击倒, 撞倒
- 拆卸
- 〈非正〉降价; 减少
- 卖时以击锤表示卖出
- 〈俚〉挣得, 获得过
- 〈俚〉偷; 抢
- 使降低; 使丢脸
- 拒绝
- 挥霍
- 在燃烧区域边缘控制〔减弱〕火焰〔高温〕
击倒：用猛烈的一击将某物击倒在地。
拍卖出售：将物品以拍卖方式卖给竞标者。
拆卸：将物品拆开。
获得（收入或薪水）：作为收入或薪水的来源。
降低（价格）：减少（价格）。

sentences.c: The elephant has such great strength that he can knock down a man with it.
sentences.cn: 大象力气很大，可以打倒一个人。

sentences.c: The market might abandon the stock, and knock down its price.
sentences.cn: 商场可能会清理库存，降低价格。

sentences.c: Please don't knock down all those cans.
sentences.cn: 请不要敲那些罐头。

trans.cn: 立即
立刻，现在，马上：表示需要立即采取行动或完成某事；
同时，同时进行
（过时用法）在一组中，一起

sentences.c: The place at once enraptured me.
sentences.cn: 这个地方立刻把我迷住了。

sentences.c: If necessary I can come at once.
sentences.cn: 如果有必要，我可以马上来。

sentences.c: 'Come here at once!' she ordered.
sentences.cn: “马上过来！”她命令道。

trans.cn: 无
伸手；开始大踏步走；同“stretch”
伸展：伸展的行为或状态；延伸或延长，如偿还债务所需的时间。
增加工作量：工人需要承担更多的工作量，但没有相应的加薪。

sentences.c: He was about to stretch out his hand to grab me.
sentences.cn: 他正要伸手抓我。

sentences.c: Please stretch out your hands.
sentences.cn: 请伸出你的双手。

sentences.c: Stretch out your tongue.
sentences.cn: 伸出舌头。

trans.cn: 从…以来

sentences.c: He's borne me a grudge ever since that day.
sentences.cn: 从那一天起他便对我怀恨在心。

sentences.c: He's borne a grudge against me ever since that day.
sentences.cn: 从那一天起他便对我怀恨在心。

sentences.c: He's had a car ever since he was 18.
sentences.cn: 他从18岁起就有汽车了。

trans.cn: 神话故事；童话
童话故事：一种虚构的故事，通常包含魔法、奇幻元素和道德教育意义。

sentences.c: She was like a princess in a fairy tale.
sentences.cn: 她像童话故事里的一位公主。

sentences.c: A fairy tale usually has a pleasant ending.
sentences.cn: 童话通常有一个愉快的结局。

sentences.c: Every one of them wanted the fairy tale to have a happy ending.
sentences.cn: 他们每个人都希望这个童话故事有一个幸福的结局。

trans.cn: 上下颠倒

sentences.c: Every pill made my insides turn upside down.
sentences.cn: 每片药都使我的胃翻江倒海。

sentences.c: You turn the map upside down.
sentences.cn: 你把地图拿倒了。

sentences.c: In ancient China, there is also a saying, water can hold the boat, it can also make the boat turn upside down.
sentences.cn: 在中国古代也有谚语说，水能载舟，亦能覆舟。

trans.cn: 倾吐；诉说
倾吐：自由地表达（一种情感）；自由地谈论（个人事情）。

sentences.c: You can pour out your heart to me.
sentences.cn: 你可以向我倾吐心声。

sentences.c: Friends are those whom we can pour out our heart to when we're sad.
sentences.cn: 朋友是那些我们在悲伤之时可以敞开心扉之人。

sentences.c: We must pour out a large stream of essential words, unhampered by stops, or qualifying adjectives, or finite verbs.
sentences.cn: 我们必须大量使用基本词汇，不受句号、修饰性形容词或限定动词的限制。

trans.cn: 科学方法
科学方法：一套系统追求知识的原则和程序，包括问题的认识和制定、通过观察和实验收集数据，以及假设的制定和测试。

sentences.c: I do not believe, as a field archaeologist, that we can use the scientific method to prove or disprove them.
sentences.cn: 作为一个实地考古学家，我不相信我们能用科学手段对它们进行证实或证伪。

sentences.c: In the idealized version of how science is done, facts about the world are waiting to be observed and collected by objective researchers who use the scientific method to carry out their work.
sentences.cn: 在科学实践的理想化版本中，世界的真相正等待客观的研究人员观察和收集，这些研究人员用科学的方法进行工作。

sentences.c: They learn about the scientific method.
sentences.cn: 他们要学习科学方法。

trans.cn: (飞机)起飞；出去；拿掉；移送

sentences.c: The plane is ready for take-off.
sentences.cn: 飞机准备随时起飞。

sentences.c: The plane made a clean take-off.
sentences.cn: 飞机起飞得干净利落。

sentences.c: According to observers, the plane exploded shortly after take-off.
sentences.cn: 据目击者说，飞机起飞后不久就爆炸了。

trans.cn: 用完
用尽：指耗尽力量或有用的特性。

sentences.c: It isn't animals who use up the world's resources.
sentences.cn: 不是动物耗尽了世界资源。

sentences.c: He has to use up one billion yuan within a month first, or he will get nothing.
sentences.cn: 首先，他必须在一个月内用完10亿元，否则他将一无所获。

sentences.c: The cameras take a photo every time you open the fridge to show what's being used and what you are about to use up.
sentences.cn: 每次你打开冰箱的时候，这些相机都会拍下照片，显示冰箱里已经用过的东西和即将用完的东西。

trans.cn: 由……构成
由……组成：指某物是由若干部分或成分组成的。

sentences.c: Any rule must be made up of productions.
sentences.cn: 任何规则都必须由产品组成。

sentences.c: A message can be made up of one or more parts.
sentences.cn: 消息可以有一个或者多个part组成。

sentences.c: This is because objects may be made up of other objects.
sentences.cn: 这是因为对象可能是由其他对象构成的。

trans.cn: 星系；（尤指）太阳系
[天] 太阳系

sentences.c: Saturn is the second biggest planet in the solar system.
sentences.cn: 土星是太阳系的第二大的行星。

sentences.c: The picture shows six of the nine planets in the solar system.
sentences.cn: 这张图片展示太阳系9个行星中的6个行星。

sentences.c: The spacecraft will enable scientists to study some dark corners of the solar system.
sentences.cn: 太空船使得科学家可以研究太阳系中一些不为人知的角落。

trans.cn: 在黄昏时候；晚上
在夜里

sentences.c: These animals only come out at night.
sentences.cn: 这些动物只在夜晚出来。

sentences.c: At night, danger lurks in these streets.
sentences.cn: 夜晚这些街上隐藏着危险。

sentences.c: At night, the dark streets become menacing.
sentences.cn: 在夜晚，漆黑的街道变得阴森森的。

trans.cn: 即使
即使，尽管：表示在某种条件下，即使这种条件发生，也不会影响到另一个事实或结果。

sentences.c: Even if the amendment is passed it can be defeated judicially.
sentences.cn: 即使这项修正案获得了通过，它也有可能通过司法程序被否决。

sentences.c: Even if you have dark skin, you still need protection from the sun.
sentences.cn: 即使你皮肤黝黑，仍需要防晒。

sentences.c: Even if I had the talent to play tennis I couldn't stand the pressure.
sentences.cn: 即使我有打网球的天资，我也承受不了那种压力。

trans.cn: 总的来说；通常
通常，一般来说

sentences.c: In general, a plain carpet makes a room look bigger.
sentences.cn: 一般来讲，纯色的地毯使房间显得更大。

sentences.c: In general, Japanese cars are very reliable and breakdowns are rare.
sentences.cn: 日本汽车通常是很可靠的，发生故障的情况极少。

sentences.c: I know how it works in general terms.
sentences.cn: 我大致知道其中的运作原理。

trans.cn: 除了
除了，除去：表示除去某个人或某个事物之外。
要不是：表示如果没有某个人或某个事物的话。

sentences.c: I had nothing on except for my socks.
sentences.cn: 我除了短袜什么都没穿。

sentences.c: The room was silent except for the TV.
sentences.cn: 除了电视的声音，那房间里寂静无声。

sentences.c: The walls were bare except for a clock.
sentences.cn: 墙上除了一只挂钟什么也没有。

trans.cn: 和…有(亲戚)关系
与……有关：指两个或多个事物之间存在某种联系或关联。

sentences.c: It is thought to be related to food consumption.
sentences.cn: 它被认为与食物消费有关。

sentences.c: Innovative science produces new propositions in terms of which diverse phenomena can be related to one another in more coherent ways.
sentences.cn: 创新科学会产生新的命题，使不同的现象以更连贯的方式相互关联。

sentences.c: In the future, pay increases will be related to productivity.
sentences.cn: 以后，工资的增加将和业绩挂钩。

trans.cn: 数以亿计的；亿万；数十亿的
非常多的数量

sentences.c: The country owes billions of dollars to foreign creditors.
sentences.cn: 这个国家欠外国债权人数十亿元。

sentences.c: She faces charges of helping to plunder her country's treasury of billions of dollars.
sentences.cn: 她面临协从窃取国库中数十亿美元的指控。

sentences.c: The insurance industry will pay out billions of dollars for damage caused by Hurricane Katrina.
sentences.cn: 保险业将为卡特里娜飓风造成的损失赔付数十亿美元。

trans.cn: ￡ 500 a week 每星期卖得五百镑
把……翻过来

sentences.c: The government did an about-turn over nuclear energy.
sentences.cn: 政府对核能的态度来了个180度的大转变。

sentences.c: He realized he was in the wrong and promised to turn over a new leaf.
sentences.cn: 他认识到自己错了，承诺要重新开始。

sentences.c: They became the first company in their field to pass the $2 billion turn-over mark.
sentences.cn: 他们成为他们那个领域第一家市场营业额超过$20亿的公司。

trans.cn: 提高；强使(物价等)上升
【体】俯卧撑
突出；突起：从某物中突出或突起。

sentences.c: Any shortage could push up grain prices.
sentences.cn: 任何短缺都会推动粮价上涨。

sentences.c: They get caught in trees (hence the epithet "Witches' Knickers"), take hundreds of years to decompose and push up demand for oil, used to make plastics.
sentences.cn: 它们挂在枝头（由此而得“巫婆的灯笼裤”之名），需要数百年才能分解，它们助长石油需求，正是石油用于制造塑料。

sentences.c: I feel, in my muscles, the need to push up.
sentences.cn: 我凭肌肉能感觉到我在支撑着它。

trans.cn: 【航】推下；【自】后进先出存储器
压下：指向下方施加压力或力量。

sentences.c: The government had done everything it could to push down inflation.
sentences.cn: 政府已经竭尽全力遏制通货膨胀。

sentences.c: Very much the same in the south except that the rain is starting to push down into the northern parts of the Mediterranean there.
sentences.cn: 南部地区的情况非常相似，除了降雨开始向地中海北部地区推进。

sentences.c: They can push down the thirteenth partial and bring up the fifteenth and thereby change the sound of a clarinet into a French horn.
sentences.cn: 他们可以压低第十三分音，或者提高第十五分音，从而将单簧管的声音变成圆号的。

trans.cn: 在适当的位置；适当
在适当的位置、准备好或已经安排好：某物或某人在正确的位置，或者指某事已经完成或准备就绪。

sentences.c: We already have our core team in place.
sentences.cn: 我们的核心队伍已经就位。

sentences.c: The material is cut and glued in place.
sentences.cn: 材料被剪开并粘到合适的位置。

sentences.c: Each pleat was stitched in place by hand.
sentences.cn: 每个褶子都是手工缝制的。

trans.cn: 参与
参与，涉及：参与某个活动、事件或组织，与之相关联。
卷入，牵涉：被卷入或牵涉到某个活动、事件或问题中。

sentences.c: He was rumoured to be involved in the crime.
sentences.cn: 有传言说他卷入了这桩罪行。

sentences.c: He reasserted that all parties should be involved in the talks.
sentences.cn: 他再次声明各方均应参加会谈。

sentences.c: I'm very much afraid that your son may be involved in the crime.
sentences.cn: 我非常担忧（very much afraid）你儿子可能在这罪案中受到牵连。

trans.cn: 分割；瓜分
分割：特别是将某物分成不同的份额以便分配。

sentences.c: How shall we divide up the work?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么分工呢？

sentences.c: Well, how do you divide up your schedule?
sentences.cn: 那么，你们是怎么分配你们的工作安排呢？

sentences.c: The idea is to divide up the country into four sectors.
sentences.cn: 该观点是将国家一分为四。

trans.cn: 对…有影响

sentences.c: Lack of money will have an adverse effect on our research programme.
sentences.cn: 缺少资金将对我们的研究方案有不利影响。

sentences.c: Cities have a powerful magnetizing effect on young people.
sentences.cn: 城市对青年人有着强大的吸引力。

sentences.c: This budget will have a net expansionary effect on the economy.
sentences.cn: 本预算对经济的发展最终会有促进作用。

trans.cn: 两个
两个（事物）或几个（事物）

sentences.c: I saw a couple of men get out.
sentences.cn: 我看见有两个男人出去了。

sentences.c: He dashed off a couple of novels.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆地完成了几本小说。

sentences.c: We went there a couple of years ago.
sentences.cn: 我们几年前去过那里。

trans.cn: 动作片
动作电影：一种电影类型，其情节涉及快节奏的活动和冲突，通常包括英雄主角、暴力打斗、杂技特技、追逐场面和枪战等元素。

sentences.c: It's an action movie.
sentences.cn: 这是一部动作片。

sentences.c: There are many fights in this thick book that you would see in a good action movie.
sentences.cn: 在这本厚厚的书中，你会看到许多平时出现在精彩动作电影中的打斗场景。

sentences.c: There was an old action movie next.
sentences.cn: 接下来演的是一部老动作片。

trans.cn: 科幻电影(或小说等)
科幻小说：主要涉及实际或想象中的科学对社会或个人的影响，或者具有科学因素作为基本定向组成部分的小说。

sentences.c: He loves science fiction in particular.
sentences.cn: 他特别喜爱科幻小说。

sentences.c: In this section you'll find horror and science fiction.
sentences.cn: 你可以在这一部分找恐怖和科幻小说。

sentences.c: The idea of cloning extinct life forms still belongs to science fiction.
sentences.cn: 对绝种的生命形式进行克隆的想法仍然属于科学幻想。

trans.cn: 坏；进展顺利
上映；演出；在进行；（灯）亮着；接受打赌

sentences.c: Don't worry, she'll be on time.
sentences.cn: 别担心，她会准时的。

sentences.c: I like to be on my own sometimes.
sentences.cn: 有时候我喜欢一个人待着。

sentences.c: All eyes will be on tomorrow's vote.
sentences.cn: 明天的投票将是众目所注。

synos.cn: 上映；演出；在进行；（灯）亮着；接受打赌

trans.cn: 离开
突然爆炸或发出巨响：指突然爆炸或发出巨响。
离开，离去：指离开或离去。
变坏，变质：指变坏或变质。
按预期或期望进行，进行下去：指按照预期或期望进行，进行下去。
发出特定的声音：指发出特定的声音。

sentences.c: What time do you go off duty?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候下班？

sentences.c: He heard the alarm go off.
sentences.cn: 他听见警报器响了。

sentences.c: He was priming the bomb to go off in an hour's time.
sentences.cn: 他在事先准备炸弹在一小时后爆炸。

trans.cn: 为了
为了，以便

sentences.c: My friends endured tremendous danger in order to help me.
sentences.cn: 为了帮助我，我的朋友们经历了巨大的危险。

sentences.c: They spread disinformation in order to discredit politicians.
sentences.cn: 他们为破坏政治家们的名声故意散布假信息。

sentences.c: Is it in order to speak now?
sentences.cn: 依规定现在可以发言了吗？

trans.cn: 表演（节目）
穿上：指将衣物穿在身上。
假装：指故意表现出某种外貌或行为。
增加：指增加体重或数量。
上演：指进行表演或演出。
戏弄：指故意误导或开玩笑。

sentences.c: She put on the brakes suddenly.
sentences.cn: 她突然踩了刹车。

sentences.c: He put on an American accent.
sentences.cn: 他假操着一口美国腔。

sentences.c: She was put on a respirator.
sentences.cn: 给她戴上了人工呼吸器。

synos.cn: 穿上；上演；增加；假装；使…上场

trans.cn: 使分解（为），使变化（成）
使倒塌或破碎：将物体引起倒塌或破碎。
使无效：消除法律障碍。
分解：将化合物分解为更简单的物质。
拆开：为了存储或运输而拆开，以便以后重新组装。
停止运行：因为损坏或磨损而停止运行。
失效：失去效力或无效。
力量或活力衰竭：力量或活力减弱或消失。
精神或情绪崩溃：因为心理或情绪压力而崩溃。
放弃抵抗：失去决心或放弃抵抗。
（马匹）严重受伤：马匹的蹄关节的支持韧带或骨骼严重受伤。
分析或细分：进行分析或细分。

sentences.c: It also means there are no moving parts to break down.
sentences.cn: 这也意味着没有活动零部件可拆卸。

sentences.c: Many people were expecting (that) the peace talks would break down.
sentences.cn: 许多人预料和平谈判会破裂。

sentences.c: She made numerous efforts to break down colour lines in public places.
sentences.cn: 她为打破公共场所的种族界限做出过许多努力。

synos.cn: 分解；发生故障；失败；毁掉；制服

trans.cn: 前天
前天：指两天前的时间。

sentences.c: To think I was lying on a beach only the day before yesterday.
sentences.cn: 想想吧，就在前天，我还躺在海滩上呢。

sentences.c: The day before yesterday is Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 前天是星期三。

sentences.c: She reached Paris the day before yesterday.
sentences.cn: 她前天到达巴黎。

trans.cn: 无

sentences.c: The breakdown of the HW32-2 hydraulic pump of the dumping system causes a model 5511 Kamaz dump truck to be out of service.
sentences.cn: 由于自卸系统的HW32-2型举升液压泵损坏，造成一台卡玛兹5511型自卸汽车无法使用。

sentences.c: There will be construction in corridors and elevators, elevator will be out of service rotationally. Please be careful should you pass the working area.
sentences.cn: 施工期间将在走廊进行穿线作业，电梯将逐部轮流停运，届时请您出入时注意安全。

sentences.c: I could totally understand that some people might hold higher codes than others, but that would be out of service rather than out of elitism or hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 我完全能理解有些人可能持有比其他人更高的代码，但那是出于服务目的而非出于精英主义或等级制度。

trans.cn: 短信
短信：指从一个手机或寻呼机发送给另一个手机或寻呼机的书面信息，通常包含缩写词。

sentences.c: I'll send you a text message.
sentences.cn: 我会给你发一条短信。

sentences.c: I tapped out a text message to Mandy.
sentences.cn: 我给曼迪发了一条短信。

sentences.c: What do the letters "KIT" mean in the text message?
sentences.cn: 这条短信里的三个字母——“KIT” ——是什么意思？

trans.cn: 倒退；投入；从中间插话；打圆场
投入

sentences.c: Do you want a ride? Jump in.
sentences.cn: 你想搭车吗？快上来吧。

sentences.c: A big jump in energy conservation could be achieved without much disruption of anyone's standard of living.
sentences.cn: 能源节约的一个大飞跃可以在不太影响任何人生活水平的前提下得以实现。

sentences.c: He is good at long jump in our class.
sentences.cn: 他在我们班擅长跳远。

trans.cn: 我也是；我也不；我也不是
我也不：用于表示前面说话者所说的否定性陈述也适用于自己。

sentences.c: She is good, sir, and giveth me neither sorrow nor pain of any sort.
sentences.cn: 她很好，殿下，她既不使我悲伤，也不使我痛苦。

sentences.c: Me neither. Let's drink to this.
sentences.cn: 我也没有。让我们为此干杯。

sentences.c: Me neither. People call the style surrealism!
sentences.cn: 我也不懂。人们称这种风格为超现实主义。

trans.cn: (大学与中学中之)学生会
学生会：由其他学生选举产生的一群学生组成的团体，代表学生参与学校管理，并协助策划学生活动。

sentences.c: Would you be interested in joining the student council?
sentences.cn: 你有没有兴趣加入学生会?

sentences.c: A: Would you be interested in joining the student council?
sentences.cn: 你有没有兴趣加入学生会？

sentences.c: Join a club, or a fraternity or sorority, or the student council.
sentences.cn: 加入一个社团或者联谊会，又或者是学生会。

trans.cn: 为…作准备

sentences.c: Elaine wouldn't let him provide for her.
sentences.cn: 伊莱恩不肯让他供养她。

sentences.c: I intend to get betrothed, for I can provide for more than one family.
sentences.cn: 我打算订婚，因为我可以供养不止一个家庭。

sentences.c: In some recordings, Frost says, "Or somebody will provide for you."
sentences.cn: 在一些记录中，弗罗斯特说：“或者有人会给予你。”

trans.cn: 最后；终于
最终，最后

sentences.c: They live in the end house.
sentences.cn: 他们住在最后的那座房子。

sentences.c: In the end, wiser counsels prevailed.
sentences.cn: 高明的建议最终占了上风。

sentences.c: Everything will come right in the end.
sentences.cn: 一切到最后都会好起来的。

trans.cn: 达成协议；达成一致；达成共识
达成协议：指双方或多方经过协商、讨论等达成共识或一致意见。

sentences.c: Negotiators again worked right down to the wire to reach an agreement.
sentences.cn: 谈判者们再次一直工作到最后达成协议为止。

sentences.c: The most important thing is to reach an agreement and to avoid a trade war.
sentences.cn: 最重要的就是达成协议，避免贸易战。

sentences.c: Companies have been stymied by the length of time it takes to reach an agreement.
sentences.cn: 数个公司因耗费很长时间以达成协议而受到阻碍。

synos.cn: 达成协议；取得一致意见，达成共识

trans.cn: 剖析；视为

sentences.c: Take as much time as you like.
sentences.cn: 你想花多少时间就花多少时间。

sentences.c: Recycling doesn't take as much energy as making these things the first time.
sentences.cn: 回收利用不会像第一次制造这些东西一样消耗那么多的能量。

sentences.c: There is no give and take, as the controller is uncomfortable and bossy if you want to make a choice about something.
sentences.cn: 那是不容商量的，因为如果你想对某件事做出选择，控制狂会不安且专横。

trans.cn: 挨过；熬过
忍受，熬过：经历或承受困难、痛苦或不愉快的事情，尽力度过困境。

sentences.c: I'm sure a number of you had to suffer through Barmans textbooks.
sentences.cn: 我想你们中有一些人还得忍受，巴曼编的教科书。

sentences.c: We were perfectly happy to suffer through recessions when they occurred only every 15 to 30 years.
sentences.cn: 当衰退每15到30年发生一次时，我们很高兴地去经历。

sentences.c: Yes, it's completely normal for even the most super-fit running fanatic to suffer through difficult runs.
sentences.cn: 事实上，这是完全正常的，即使是那些超级健康的跑步狂热分子也会经历这样的痛苦。

trans.cn: 第二次世界大战
第二次世界大战

sentences.c: They endured five years of privation during the World War II.
sentences.cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，他们忍受了五年的贫困生活。

sentences.c: People of my generation who lived through World War II have vivid memories of confusion and incompetence.
sentences.cn: 我们这一代经历过第二次世界大战的人都还清晰地记得当时的混乱和无能为力。

sentences.c: During the World War II, millions of Germans lost their lives.
sentences.cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，数百万德国人失去了生命。

trans.cn: (第二次大战后成立的)联合国
联合国

sentences.c: He was working under the flag of the United Nations.
sentences.cn: 他在联合国工作。

sentences.c: The United Nations has pleaded for a halt to the bombing.
sentences.cn: 联合国已呼吁停止轰炸。

sentences.c: It is grossly unfair to impute blame to the United Nations.
sentences.cn: 把责任归咎于联合国是极不公平的。

trans.cn: 联合国（United Nations）
联合国（United Nations）

sentences.c: The UN declared it a safe area.
sentences.cn: 联合国宣布此处为安全区。

sentences.c: They refused to comply with the UN resolution.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝遵守联合国的决议。

sentences.c: The UN has demanded that all troops be withdrawn.
sentences.cn: 联合国已要求撤出所有部队。

trans.cn: 无

sentences.c: The Secretary-General was asked to mediate in the dispute.
sentences.cn: 有人请秘书长来调解这次纷争。

sentences.c: Montas said the secretary-general reaffirmed his full support for Eide.
sentences.cn: 蒙塔斯还说，秘书长重申他全力支持艾德。

sentences.c: I thank Mr. Zannier, Special Representative of the Secretary-General for his briefing.
sentences.cn: 我感谢秘书长特别代表赞尼尔先生的通报。

trans.cn: 联合国安理会；联合国安全理事会
联合国安全理事会：联合国的一个主要机构，负责维护国际和平与安全。它由15个成员国组成，其中5个是常任理事国，拥有否决权，其他10个是非常任理事国，每两年轮换一次。

sentences.c: The U.S. is trying to neutralize the resolution in the UN Security Council.
sentences.cn: 美国试图在联合国安理会阻止该决议的通过。

sentences.c: After the UN Security Council imposed the most serious sanctions on Pyongyang, what is needed now is for all parties to show wisdom and patience.
sentences.cn: 联合国安理会对平壤实施了最严厉的制裁之后，现在需要各方拿出智慧和耐心。

sentences.c: The UN Security Council has weighed in too.
sentences.cn: 联合国安理会亦介入。

trans.cn: 永久成员
常任理事国：指联合国安理会中的五个成员国，即中华人民共和国、法兰西共和国、俄罗斯联邦、英国和美利坚合众国。

sentences.c: China is a permanent member of the UN Security Council. What is your position on the plan?
sentences.cn: 中国是安理会常任理事国，对此持何立场？

sentences.c: As a permanent member of the Security Council, China is committed to safeguarding world peace and stability.
sentences.cn: 作为安理会常任理事国，中国一贯致力于维护世界的和平与稳定。

sentences.c: But don't expect China, a permanent member of the U.N. Security Council, to add its voice to the call for change.
sentences.cn: 但是，千万不要期望中国，这个联合国安理会的常任理事国，会支持改变。

trans.cn: 一致同意
就……达成一致意见：在某个问题上达成共识或一致意见。

sentences.c: We rarely agree on what to do.
sentences.cn: 我们很少在要做的事情上看法一致。

sentences.c: The deal fell apart when we failed to agree on a price.
sentences.cn: 我们在价格上未能达成一致意见，生意吹了。

sentences.c: I value the opinion of my husband and we agree on most things.
sentences.cn: 我重视我丈夫的意见，而且我们在大多数事情上看法一致。

trans.cn: 安静地；沉默地
静默地：没有发出声音，保持安静。

sentences.c: We drove homewards in silence.
sentences.cn: 我们默默地开车回家。

sentences.c: She contemplated him in silence.
sentences.cn: 她默默地注视着他。

sentences.c: Rosanna and Forbes walked in silence.
sentences.cn: 罗莎娜与福布斯默默地走着。

trans.cn: 沉默；保持沉默；保持安静
保持沉默：不说话或不透露信息。

sentences.c: You must keep silent during the exam.
sentences.cn: 考试时你必须保持沉默。

sentences.c: Would you please keep silent? The weather report is being broadcast and I want to listen.
sentences.cn: 你可以保持安静吗？正在播天气预报，我想听一下。

sentences.c: Hoping to discover what language a child would speak if he heard no mother tongue, he told the nurses to keep silent.
sentences.cn: 他希望发现一个没有听到母语的孩子会说什么语言，他让护士们保持沉默。

trans.cn: 打算做某事；想要做某事；本意是想要做某事

sentences.c: Do you mean to say you've lost it?
sentences.cn: 你是说你把那东西给弄丢了？

sentences.c: In another firm the workers were constantly complaining about the malfunctioning heating system, but the owners were too busy or too mean to do anything about it.
sentences.cn: 在另一家公司，工人们不停地抱怨出故障的供暖系统，但老板们太忙或太刻薄，对此无动于衷。

sentences.c: In another firm the workers were constantly complaining about the malfunctioning heating system, but the owners was too busy or too mean to do anything about it.
sentences.cn: 在另一家公司，工人们不停地抱怨出故障的供暖系统，但老板们太忙或太刻薄，对此不予置喙。

trans.cn: 毕竟，终究
毕竟：尽管有相反的考虑或期望。
考虑到一切：考虑到所有情况。

sentences.c: So you made it after all!
sentences.cn: 你毕竟成功了！

sentences.c: After all, The Masters is an invitational tournament.
sentences.cn: 毕竟，这项大师赛是一场邀请赛。

sentences.c: It was actually quite fun after all.
sentences.cn: 这居然还很有趣。

trans.cn: 感谢；幸亏；多亏

sentences.c: It was all a great success—thanks to a lot of hard work.
sentences.cn: 由于尽心竭力，这才大获成功。

sentences.c: I would like to propose a vote of thanks to our host.
sentences.cn: 我提议向我们的主人表示感谢。

sentences.c: The delegation was carrying a message of thanks to President Mubarak.
sentences.cn: 代表团向穆巴拉克总统传达谢意。

trans.cn: 开会
召开会议：组织并进行一次会议，讨论特定的议题或问题。

sentences.c: The three IT managers hold a meeting.
sentences.cn: 三家花店的 IT 经理进行了一次面谈。

sentences.c: We discussed whether we should hold a meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们讨论了是否要开一个会。

sentences.c: Why not to study under that tree and hold a meeting?
sentences.cn: 为什么不去那棵树下学习再开个讨论会呢？

trans.cn: 争夺；为…争吵；为而争吵

sentences.c: We had a fight over money.
sentences.cn: 我们为钱吵了一架。

sentences.c: Beyond money matters, is there a fundamental fight over the future of the NHS?
sentences.cn: 除了钱财问题，是不是还有一场关于国民保健服务未来的根本争论？

sentences.c: If so, you'll love the next big debate: the fight over climate change.
sentences.cn: 如果是这样，你应该会喜欢下面这个巨大的争论话题：应对气候变化。

trans.cn: 与其；不愿
而不是：用于表示选择或对比；
不是……而是：用于表示更正或纠正之前的错误陈述。

sentences.c: He will drain, rather than enrich, the country.
sentences.cn: 他将耗尽而不是增加国家的财富。

sentences.c: You are buying direct, rather than through an agent.
sentences.cn: 你在直接购买，而不是通过代理商购买。

sentences.c: The problem was psychological rather than physiological.
sentences.cn: 这是个心理而不是生理问题。

trans.cn: 压岁钱；红包；吉利钱
幸运钱：在节日、婚礼或其他特殊场合赠送的礼金。在东亚地区，它是一种常见的礼物。

sentences.c: Many teenagers gave away their pocket money and lucky money.
sentences.cn: 许多青少年把他们的零花钱和压岁钱捐出去了。

sentences.c: Kids are given lucky money.
sentences.cn: 孩子们会得到压岁钱。

sentences.c: It has evolved into today's red packet or lucky money that parents and older relatives give to children during the Lunar New Year to wish them good luck.
sentences.cn: 它已经演变成今天的红包或压岁钱，父母和年长的亲戚在农历新年给孩子，祝他们好运。

trans.cn: 庙会；逛庙会；大溪庙会
庙会：一种传统的中国文化活动，通常在寺庙附近举行，包括游戏、表演、美食和手工艺品等各种娱乐项目。

sentences.c: There were so many people at the temple fair that we could only elbow our way through the crowd.
sentences.cn: 庙会上非常多人，以致于我们只能挤过人群。

sentences.c: What about DiTan Temple Fair?
sentences.cn: 地坛庙会怎么样?

sentences.c: Have you been to the Temple Fair?
sentences.cn: 你曾经去过庙会吗？

trans.cn: 无
和…有相通之处；公有
共同的；共有的

sentences.c: We had a surprising amount in common.
sentences.cn: 我们共同之处出奇地多。

sentences.c: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.cn: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

sentences.c: Plants are grouped into botanical "families" that have certain characteristics in common.
sentences.cn: 具有某些共同特点的植物被归为植物学的科。

trans.cn: 类似于；与...相似
类似于：具有相似的特征、性质或特点。

sentences.c: Wu said it would be similar to how we get moonlight, but he predicted that the man-made moon would have eight times the brightness of the real one.
sentences.cn: 吴说，这将类似于我们获得月亮光照的方式，但他预测，人造月亮的亮度将是真实月亮的8倍。

sentences.c: Your file will be similar to Listing 5.
sentences.cn: 您的文件将类似清单5。

sentences.c: Your output should be similar to Listing 2.
sentences.cn: 您的输出应该与请单2所示类似。

trans.cn: 与…不同；除了
除了，除外：表示除了某个人或某个事物之外，其他都不包括在内。
除了……以外：表示除了某个特定情况之外。

sentences.c: I don't know any French people other than you.
sentences.cn: 除了你，我不认识别的法国人。

sentences.c: Other than blowing up a tyre I hadn't done any car maintenance.
sentences.cn: 除了给一个轮胎充气外，我没有做过任何汽车保养。

sentences.c: Men are more inhibited about touching each other than women are.
sentences.cn: 触摸同性时男人比女人要更加拘谨。

trans.cn: 人的；有人性的；显示人类特点的,n. 人类, 是人；指人类；泛指人
人类，人类的一员

sentences.c: It's not a thing. It's a human being!
sentences.cn: 这不是一件东西，这是一个人！

sentences.c: That is no way to treat another human being.
sentences.cn: 那绝不是对待他人的方式。

sentences.c: The soldier acted qua soldier, not as a human being.
sentences.cn: 那名士兵当时以军人的身份行事，而不是以一般人的身份。

trans.cn: 轮流；依次
轮流做某事，以便分享责任或机会

sentences.c: Males and females take turns brooding the eggs.
sentences.cn: 雌雄轮流孵卵。

sentences.c: The male and female birds take turns in sitting on the eggs.
sentences.cn: 雄鸟和雌鸟轮流伏窝。

sentences.c: He and Carla Torgerson take turns as the band's lead vocalist.
sentences.cn: 他和卡拉·托格森轮流担任乐队的领唱。

trans.cn: 中美洲（包括危地马拉、伯利兹、洪都拉斯、萨尔瓦多、尼加拉瓜、哥斯达黎加以及巴拿马）
中美洲（位于墨西哥与南美洲之间）；中美洲各国

sentences.c: He travelled to an orphanage (孤儿院) in Guatemala in Central America.
sentences.cn: 他去了中美洲危地马拉的一个孤儿院。

sentences.c: After Italy, I went to Central America and worked with a team of volunteers.
sentences.cn: 从意大利回来后，我去了中美洲，和一群志愿者一起工作。

sentences.c: I want to travel around Belize and Central America.
sentences.cn: 我想周游伯利兹和中美洲。

synos.cn: 中美洲（位于墨西哥与南美洲之间）；中美洲各国

trans.cn: 整理干净
整理、收拾或清理一个地方，使其变得有序或整洁：指对一个地方进行整理、收拾或清理，使其变得有序或整洁。

sentences.c: I'll tidy up right now.
sentences.cn: 我马上收拾。

sentences.c: Please tidy up the classroom.
sentences.cn: 请整理教室。

sentences.c: Please tidy up these books.
sentences.cn: 请你把这些书收拾好。

trans.cn: 挂断电话；挂机；悬挂；耽搁
挂起：将物品放在专门设计的挂钩或衣架上。
挂断电话：将电话听筒放回底座，断开连接。
延迟，搁置：使延迟、暂停或搁置。
卡住，被卡住：使物体卡住或被卡住，无法移动。
断线：电话连接中断。

sentences.c: Don't hang up on me—we must talk!
sentences.cn: 别挂断电话—我们一定得谈谈！

sentences.c: It's no use. Let's hang up and try for a better line.
sentences.cn: 没用。我们挂断电话试打更好的线路吧。

sentences.c: Perhaps her ladyship would like to hang up her own clothes today!
sentences.cn: 尊贵的夫人今天也许愿意动手自己把衣服挂起来吧！

trans.cn: 警官
警察：警察部队的成员。

sentences.c: A police officer was killed when his car blew up.
sentences.cn: 一名警官在其汽车爆炸时遇难。

sentences.c: The police officer was suspended while the complaint was investigated.
sentences.cn: 投诉调查期间，这位警员被暂停职务。

sentences.c: The police officer radioed for help.
sentences.cn: 警察用无线电呼救。

trans.cn: 与……相处；进展
相处融洽：与他人相处或共存时，没有争吵或麻烦。

sentences.c: It's impossible to get along with him.
sentences.cn: 不可能跟他和睦相处。

sentences.c: Their sense of humour and ability to get along with people are two characteristics that compensate for their lack of experience.
sentences.cn: 他们的幽默感和与人相处的能力是弥补他们经验不足的两个特质。

sentences.c: Nowadays, it's difficult for parents to get along with their mythical creatures.
sentences.cn: 如今，父母很难和他们的“神兽”相处。

trans.cn: 满意
对……感到满意

sentences.c: Never be satisfied with yourself, or you will fall behind others.
sentences.cn: 永远不要自我满足，否则你会落后于别人。

sentences.c: It rarely makes sense to buy at that high a price for them to be satisfied with being paid off only at par (the full value of the bond).
sentences.cn: 以这么高的价格买进，让他们满足于只按票面价值(债券的全部价值)偿付，几乎没有什么意义。

sentences.c: I would be satisfied with just a wife.
sentences.cn: 只要有个老婆我就满足了。

trans.cn: 露天
公开地，毫无隐瞒地：指在公共场合或公共视野内，没有任何隐瞒或保密。

sentences.c: A log fire roared in the open hearth.
sentences.cn: 柴火在敞开着的壁炉里熊熊燃烧。

sentences.c: Children need to play out in the open.
sentences.cn: 孩子需要在户外玩耍。

sentences.c: Krishna stands downstage in the open area.
sentences.cn: 克里希那站在舞台前部的开阔区域。

trans.cn: 无
达成解决方案：通过讨论、协商或思考等方式，最终达到一个解决问题的方案。

sentences.c: That's a good idea. I think we will soon come to a solution to the problem.
sentences.cn: 达倒是个好主意。我想很快我们就有解决办法了。

sentences.c: Our situation is very very very difficult but we are persistent to come to a solution because without reconciliation we can not do anything.
sentences.cn: 我们的处境非常非常艰难，但我们坚持要解决问题，因为如果不实现和解，我们什么都干不了。

sentences.c: Sometimes, we need to consider a problem from different angles in order to come up with a best solution for it.
sentences.cn: 有时候，我们需要从不同的角度考虑问题，从而想出最佳的解决办法。

trans.cn: 继续前进；(使)继续前进；〔交通警察命令〕向前!
继续前进：指继续进行到不同的地方、主题、活动等。
转变，改变：指转到新的工作、生活等。

sentences.c: Can we move on to the next item on the agenda?
sentences.cn: 我们可以接着讨论下一项议程吗？

sentences.c: Let's move on to the prickly subject of taxation reform.
sentences.cn: 咱们继续讨论下一项税制改革这个棘手的问题吧。

sentences.c: Having completed the first stage, you can move on to step 2.
sentences.cn: 第一阶段完成后，你就可以接着进行第2步了。

trans.cn: 眼神接触；目光交流
目光接触；眼神交会

sentences.c: He avoids any eye contact, quickly averting his gaze when anyone approaches.
sentences.cn: 他避免任何目光接触，任何人接近他时，他都会迅速转移视线。

sentences.c: We stare at our phones when we want to avoid eye contact.
sentences.cn: 当我们想要避免眼神接触时，我们就会盯着自己的手机。

sentences.c: The first rule is to make eye contact with your interviewer.
sentences.cn: 首先是眼睛要直视面试官。

trans.cn: 无

sentences.c: Don't waste time doing...
sentences.cn: 不要浪费时间做……。

sentences.c: We don't waste time doing 3-d models and design work for products that will never exist.
sentences.cn: 我们不会浪费时间做3d模型或设计与生产永不会存在的产品。

sentences.c: Life is too short and too wonderful to waste time doing things you really don't want to be doing.
sentences.cn: 生命过于短暂，却又绚丽多彩，我们浪费不起时间去做那些我们并不是真正想做的事情！

trans.cn: 遵守诺言；守约
遵守诺言：履行承诺或守信用，不违背自己的承诺。

sentences.c: The other hand holds a ring, which is the ring of promise: it reminds a Zoroastrian always to keep one's promises.
sentences.cn: 另一只手拿着圆环，那是许诺的圆环，提醒琐罗亚斯德教徒应当遵守他的承诺。

sentences.c: And some other rules are to build up the kids' character in order that he or she can live a life of high quality, such as delay of gratification, keep one's promise.
sentences.cn: 而有些原则是锻炼孩子的品质，让他可以更高质量地生活，比如延迟满足，说到就要做到等。

sentences.c: One should keep to one's promise.
sentences.cn: 一个人应当信守诺言。

trans.cn: 准时
准时：按照预定的时间进行；不延误或提前。
按时：在规定的时间内完成；不延迟。

sentences.c: Don't worry, she'll be on time.
sentences.cn: 别担心，她会准时的。

sentences.c: You're bang on time, as usual.
sentences.cn: 你像往常一样，非常准时。

sentences.c: The bus came right on time.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车正好准时到达。

trans.cn: （时间、空间）在…前面；早于；领先
在某人或某物前面：在某人或某物的前面位置；比某人或某物更靠前。
领先于：在竞赛、选举等中比某人或某物得分、票数等更高；比某人或某物进展更快。
在或进入未来：指在或进入未来的时间；比某人或某物更早。
早于或在某人或某物之前：在某人或某物之前的时间；比某人或某物更早。

sentences.c: We finished 15 minutes ahead of time.
sentences.cn: 我们提前15分钟完成。

sentences.c: Trading was very light ahead of yesterday's auction.
sentences.cn: 昨天的拍卖之前交易很少。

sentences.c: Two boys were ahead of us.
sentences.cn: 有两个男孩在我们前面。

trans.cn: 弄清楚，弄明白：指通过思考、研究等方式来理解或解决问题。
找到答案，解决：指通过努力、思考等方式找到答案或解决问题。

sentences.c: We could figure out the pronoun problem.
sentences.cn: 我们可以解决这个代词问题。

sentences.c: "It is very simple to figure out," answered the Fox.
sentences.cn: “这很好理解。”狐狸回答说。

sentences.c: I can't figure out how to do this.
sentences.cn: 我弄不懂怎样做这件事。

synos.cn: 解决；算出；想出；理解；断定

trans.cn: 冷却；平静下来
冷却；平静下来

sentences.c: He has had time to cool down and look at what happened more objectively.
sentences.cn: 他有时间平静下来，并且更加客观地考虑发生的一切。

sentences.c: They help you cool down when you feel like your anger might explode.
sentences.cn: 当你感觉自己要怒火爆发的时候，它们会帮助你冷静下来。

sentences.c: Going off alone to cool down is also an effective way to refuse anger, especially if you can't think clearly.
sentences.cn: 一个人独自去冷静下来也是拒绝愤怒的有效方法，尤其是当你不能清晰思考的时候。

trans.cn: 饭厅，饭堂
餐厅：在学校、大学等场所供应餐食的大型房间。

sentences.c: The dining hall is specially built for the old.
sentences.cn: 这个餐厅是专门为老年人而建的。

sentences.c: An AI robot will be used in our school dining hall next term.
sentences.cn: 下学期我们学校食堂将使用人工智能机器人。

sentences.c: We can't eat in the classroom. But we can eat in the dining hall.
sentences.cn: 我们不能在教室里吃东西。但我们可以在食堂吃。

trans.cn: 使适合
适应：适应不同的条件或用途，改变或改变某物。

sentences.c: It helps organisms adapt to environmental changes.
sentences.cn: 它帮助生物体适应环境变化。

sentences.c: Farmers already adapt to variable weather by changing their planting schedules.
sentences.cn: 农民已经通过改变种植计划来适应多变的天气。

sentences.c: Some amphibians adapt to arid environments by completing accelerated development with resting stages deep underground.
sentences.cn: 一些两栖动物通过在地下深处的休眠期内完成加速发育以适应干旱环境。

trans.cn: 不在(家)；缺(工)
缺席：不在场，不出席某个活动或场合。
缺少：某物或某人不在某个地方或情况中。

sentences.c: She became so afraid of going to school that she started to be absent from her classes.
sentences.cn: 她变得如此害怕去上学，以至于开始逃课。

sentences.c: This setup allows the HTML-specific code to be absent from your component.
sentences.cn: 这个设置允许特定于HTML的代码从组件脱离。

sentences.c: We are confident, I say, and willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be present with the Lord.
sentences.cn: 我们坦然无惧，是更愿意离开身体与主同住。

trans.cn: 目前为止
到目前为止：表示某个特定时间点之前的情况或范围。

sentences.c: What have you found so far?
sentences.cn: 迄今为止，你发现了什么？

sentences.c: It's been quiet so far.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止还是安静的。

sentences.c: So far eight workers have been killed.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止已有8名员工遇难。

etymology.d: 组合于[[so]] + [[far]]. 参见荷兰语[[zover|zo ver]].

trans.cn: 无
尽某人的责任
尽自己本分
尽自己的责任：指做自己应该做的或能够做的事情。
尽力，尽量：指尽力做到最好。

sentences.c: The credit customer is mostly the high end customer of the bank, this part of customers must become the goal that other Banks including bank of the foreign capitals do one's utmost to fight for.
sentences.cn: 信贷客户大都是银行的高端客户，这部分客户必然成为包括外资银行在内的商业银行不遗余力争夺的目标。

trans.cn: 冲进；(河)注入(海)；撞上；到达
撞上，碰上：意指偶然遇到或不期而遇。
遇到困难，遭遇：指遇到问题、困境或挑战。
偶然发现，碰巧看到：表示无意中发现或看到某事物。

sentences.c: Let me know if you run into any snags.
sentences.cn: 要是遇到什么麻烦就告诉我。

sentences.c: We had the misfortune to run into a violent storm.
sentences.cn: 我们不幸遭遇了猛烈的暴风雨。

sentences.c: The pilot told the control tower that he'd run into technical trouble.
sentences.cn: 该飞行员告诉航空站说他遇到了技术问题。

synos.cn: 遭遇，陷入；撞上，撞到；偶然遇见

trans.cn: 收到⋯⋯的来信
收到某人的来信/来电等：指从某人那里收到一封信、一个电话等。
最近没有收到某人的消息：指最近没有从某人那里收到任何消息。

sentences.c: My guess is that we won't hear from him again.
sentences.cn: 我想我们再不会收到他的消息了。

sentences.c: Drop us a line, it's always great to hear from you.
sentences.cn: 给我们写封信，能收到你的信总是让人很高兴。

sentences.c: He was none too thrilled to hear from me at that hour.
sentences.cn: 他在那个时刻接到我的电话不太高兴。

trans.cn: 至于
关于、就……而言

sentences.c: As for Jo, she's doing fine.
sentences.cn: 至于乔，她现在日子过得不错。

sentences.c: As for his job – well, he was very mysterious about it.
sentences.cn: 至于他的工作–嘿，他对此十分诡秘。

sentences.c: As for food for the party, that's all being taken care of.
sentences.cn: 关于聚会要用的食物，都在置办当中。

trans.cn: 在…之上；逼近；胜任(工作等)；掌握(情况等)

sentences.c: Her hair was coiled on top of her head.
sentences.cn: 她把头发盘在头顶上。

sentences.c: On top of everything else, my car's been stolen.
sentences.cn: 我所有的东西都被盗，连汽车也给偷走了。

sentences.c: He gets commission on top of his salary.
sentences.cn: 他除了薪金之外还拿佣金。

trans.cn: 入睡；睡着
入睡：指开始睡觉。
再次入睡：指醒来后再次入睡。

sentences.c: After changing the bed, I would fall asleep quickly.
sentences.cn: 更换床单后，我会很快入睡。

sentences.c: I can't fall asleep tonight.
sentences.cn: 今夜我无法入睡。

sentences.c: He still didn't fall asleep.
sentences.cn: 他仍然没有入睡。

trans.cn: 高中
高中：指高等中学的阶段，通常是指高中三年级。

sentences.c: The dropout rate in the District's senior high schools last year was 12.3 percent.
sentences.cn: 去年学区高中的缀学率是百分之十二点三。

sentences.c: I will be in senior high school in a month.
sentences.cn: 再过一个月我就要上高中了。

sentences.c: The life of senior high school is on the way.
sentences.cn: 高中生活即将来临。

trans.cn: 高中
高中：指提供高中教育的学校。

sentences.c: I will be in senior high school in a month.
sentences.cn: 再过一个月我就要上高中了。

sentences.c: The life of senior high school is on the way.
sentences.cn: 高中生活即将来临。

sentences.c: We are looking forward to the new life in senior high school.
sentences.cn: 我们期待着高中的新生活。

trans.cn: 初级中学
初中：通常包括七年级到九年级的学校阶段。

sentences.c: He dropped out of junior high school.
sentences.cn: 他初中辍学了。

sentences.c: The move from elementary school to middle school or junior high can be difficult.
sentences.cn: 从小学进入中学或者初中的这种变动可能会有困难。

sentences.c: Thank you, my junior high school life!
sentences.cn: 谢谢你，我的初中生活！

trans.cn: 初中
初中：指美国的一个学校，供12到15岁的孩子上学。

sentences.c: He dropped out of junior high school.
sentences.cn: 他初中辍学了。

sentences.c: Thank you, my junior high school life!
sentences.cn: 谢谢你，我的初中生活！

sentences.c: We are leaving junior high school after the exams.
sentences.cn: 考完试后，我们就初中毕业了。

trans.cn: (时间)过去, 经过，走过，依照
经过，流逝：指人或物在空间上经过，或时间的流逝。
遵循，遵守：指按照规则、标准或指示行事。
以……为依据：根据某些信息或经验做出判断或决定。
叫作，被称为：指使用某个名字或称谓。

sentences.c: Shall we walk or go by bus ?
sentences.cn: 我们步行呢，还是坐公共汽车？

sentences.c: That's a good rule to go by.
sentences.cn: 那是要遵守的好规则。

sentences.c: The original plan was to go by bus.
sentences.cn: 起初的计划是乘公交车去。

trans.cn: 摔倒，跌倒；坍塌
摔倒：指因失去平衡或意外而倒下。
失败，不达标：指未能达到期望或要求。

sentences.c: The house looked as if it was about to fall down.
sentences.cn: 房子看起来好像就要倒塌似的。

sentences.c: Don't fall down again today.
sentences.cn: 今天别再跌倒了。

sentences.c: The house will fall down.
sentences.cn: 那屋子迟早要倒塌。

trans.cn: 站起来；自己站起来；振作起来
振作起来：在经历困境后改善自己的生活。

sentences.c: Pick yourself up from where you fell — correct your mistake where you made it.
sentences.cn: 在哪儿跌倒就从哪儿爬起来。

sentences.c: Sometimes, you just need to pick yourself up and get things going.
sentences.cn: 有时你只需要鼓动一下自己，然后着手做事就可以。

sentences.c: Don't give up because you have a bad day, or a bad week. Pick yourself up, and carry on - and enlist help if you need it.
sentences.cn: 不要因为一天或者一个星期的不顺就放弃，跌倒了再爬起来，继续走下去——需要的话要寻求帮助。

trans.cn: 代表……一方；作为……的代言人
代表：代表某人或某个团体行事。

sentences.c: On behalf of the department I would like to thank you all.
sentences.cn: 我谨代表本部门感谢大家。

sentences.c: The settlement ends more than four years of litigation on behalf of the residents.
sentences.cn: 这次和解结束了代表居民的长达四年多的诉讼。

sentences.c: He spoke on behalf of all the members of the faculty and staff.
sentences.cn: 他代表全体教职员工讲了话。

trans.cn: 递出东西，伸出手(或胳膊)
拒绝加入或达成协议：指拒绝与他人一起采取行动或达成协议。
提供，呈现：指将某物呈现为可实现的事物。
坚持，持续：指保持不屈服或不妥协，或继续运作或可用。

sentences.c: In this exciting event, any visitor can hold out his arms with the local people and cheer together.
sentences.cn: 在这个激动人心的活动中，任何一个游客都可以和当地人一起伸出双臂欢呼。

sentences.c: Doctors hold out little hope of her recovering.
sentences.cn: 医生对她的痊愈不抱很大的希望。

sentences.c: We can stay here for as long as our supplies hold out.
sentences.cn: 我们可以在这里一直待到我们的储备品用完。

synos.cn: 坚持；伸出；提供；维持；抵制；主张；扣留

trans.cn: 无

sentences.c: Dextre, built by the Canadian Space Agency, has arms more than 9 feet in length and can attach power tools as fingers.
sentences.cn: 这个由加拿大航天署制造的机器人，拥有数条比9英尺还长的手臂，并有动力机构充当手指。

sentences.c: The project is funded by the Canadian Space Agency, part of an effort to build a light lunar rover for future lunar exploration.
sentences.cn: 这个项目由加拿大太空署资助，目的在于为未来的月球探险建造一辆轻型月球车。

sentences.c: To investigate further, he used satellite images from the Canadian Space Agency and Google Earth to search the dense jungle for any signs of buildings.
sentences.cn: 为了深入调查，他使用加拿大太空局提供的卫星图片和谷歌地球上的图像，在茂密的丛林中寻找建筑物的迹象。

trans.cn: 照看，照管，照顾；密切注视，监视；注意；留神
密切关注：指专注地留意或注意某人或某物。
留意：指注意或留心某人或某物的动态或变化。
注意：指集中精力观察或关注某人或某物。

sentences.c: It isn't easy to concentrate on one's work when you've got to keep one eye on a baby that's crawling all over the place.
sentences.cn: 一边要照看一个到处看到处爬的小孩，一边又要专心工作，可不是件容易的事。
